scripts.load: yarn run clone-desktop && cd element-desktop && git checkout master && git checkout v1.11.28 && yarn
scripts.create-custom-config: mkdir "element-desktop/myconfig" && yarn run run-c && cd element-desktop && yarn run fetch --noverify --cfgdir myconfig v1.11.28
scripts.start: cd element-desktop && yarn add electron && yarn start
scripts.start-custom: yarn run load && yarn run create-custom-config && yarn run start
scripts.build-custom: yarn run load && yarn run create-custom-config && yarn run build
